Uses of Package
com.guimonsters.client

  • Packages that use com.guimonsters.client 
    Package Description
    com.guimonsters.client  
    com.guimonsters.client.events  
    com.guimonsters.client.test  
  • Classes in com.guimonsters.client used by com.guimonsters.client 
    Class and Description
    Account
    An account contains the player information that the game uses for login, password reset, and keeps track of characters associated with the account.
    Actor
    Master Class for all game characters.
    Command
    A class that represents a game command.
    GameCommands
    Master Class for Commands available to specific states of gameplay.
    GameLog
    A customized JTextArea that keeps track of user input and server responses.
    GameObject
    Master class for every game object.
    GameState
    Specifies the possible states of the GameClient.
    Inventory
    Class for Inventories of GameObjects.
    MudClient
    A Swing GUI Mud Client.
  • Classes in com.guimonsters.client used by com.guimonsters.client.events 
    Class and Description
    GameLog
    A customized JTextArea that keeps track of user input and server responses.
    MudClient
    A Swing GUI Mud Client.
  • Classes in com.guimonsters.client used by com.guimonsters.client.test 
    Class and Description
    Command
    A class that represents a game command.
    GameLog
    A customized JTextArea that keeps track of user input and server responses.
